name: Active Service Agreements
query:
select
    agreement_title as "Agreement Title",
    customer_name as "Customer Name",
    sla_type as "SLA Type",
    service_category as "Category",
    assigned_engineer as "Assigned Engineer",
    total_sla_value as "Total SLA Value",
    total_visits as "Visits Logged",
    workflow_state as "Agreement Status"
from `tabAnnual Service Agreement`

WHERE
    (workflow_state = %(workflow_state)s OR %(workflow_state)s IS NULL)
    AND (sla_type = %(sla_type)s OR %(sla_type)s IS NULL)
    AND (service_category = %(service_category)s OR %(service_category)s IS NULL)
    AND (start_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s)
